A  NavigationBar  models the top navigation bar of an iOS app. The bar has a title, an optional subtitle, and two tappable areas on its left and right sides. Each of these areas may have a link, icon or both. The bar has a taller “large” mode that…

Value Each of the input components in the Learn package accept a  value  prop. We can use this prop to set the initial value of the input, or to sync its value with another part of our project’s state. Different input components have values of…
